page.title: 01Introduction to 02920093
page.content: The 'D' block is situated on the North Eastern outskirts of{Exeter,} the capital city of Devon. The four northern squares are rural and the other eight are mainly residential suburbs. There are many schools and lots of playing fields and open space. The district of{Whipton,} most of{Polsloe}and part of{Pinhoe} make up most of the residential area. There is also a large housing estate on{Beacon Heath.} There is an industrial and trading estate to the east of the block and the Exeter to Exmouth and Exeter to London (Waterloo) lines to the South.There is a great mixture of housing made up of Victorian terraces, even older detached homes and modern dwellings.The area is close to the countryside and pleasant to live in. Susan Jackaman.Age 14.
